So he opens the front door of his house with his keys and comes into the house quietly . One night he comes home very late . It is 11 : 00 p . m . But he ca n ' t find his keys . He rings the bell . Nothing happens . He rings it again . Again nothing happens . No one can hear it . Mr . Black knocks on the bedroom window . He calls his wife ' s name . He shouts but his wife does n ' t wake up . At last he stops and thinks for a few minutes . Then he begins to speak like a small child . " Mother , " he says . " I want to go to WC . " Mrs Black wakes up at once . Then he speaks to her , and she opens the door for him .
